text: suvaqrgE lOqkE prati# tiShThantiq parai$H paqrastAqt pari# gRuhNanti pRuqShThairuqpAva#rOhantiq yat parE# paqrastAqnna syuH parA$~jcaH suvaqrgA-llOqkAnniShpa#dyEraqnq. yadaqvastAqnna syuH praqjA nirda#hEyuraqBitO# divAkIqrtya#M para#ssAmAnO Bavanti suvaqrga EqvainA$M ~MlOqka u#BaqyataqH pari# gRuhNantiq yaja#mAnAq vai di#vAkIqrtya(gm)# saM~MvathsaqraH para#ssAmAnOq&BitO# divAkIqrtya#M para#ssAmAnO Bavanti saM~Mvathsaqra EqvOBaqyataqH - [  ] 26
